products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: B. | EXTERNAL HYDRANT, SPRINKLER LINE & FDA
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe of 7 mm Heavy grade conforming to IS : 3589 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved  primer and two coats of approved  paint. Pipes shall be erected with grooved joints only. All sorts of escavation, pedestal support and structural support shall be of vendor's scope. 200 NB(FOR REVAMPING OF HYDRANT LINE)
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: ms(mild steel), finish: black, grade: heavy, standard: indian standard 3589 part -1, fittings: elbows, tees, flanges, clamps, ms support dash fasteners, coating: two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved paint, joint type: grooved, feature: includes all excavation, pedestal support and structural support by vendor

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: B. | EXTERNAL HYDRANT, SPRINKLER LINE & FDA
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of  Air Compressor with motor,mounted on a common base frame with air receiver tank. The set shall be fitted  with dry suction filter, diaphragm,automatic venting device, safety valve, pressure gauge cooler, motor starter etc. The compressor shall be of capacity 25 M³/Hr( FAD), discharge pressure 10 bar, single stage, reciprocating type
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: mounting: common base frame with air receiver tank, feature: dry suction filter, feature: diaphragm, feature: automatic venting device, feature: safety valve, feature: pressure gauge cooler, feature: motor starter, type: single stage, type: reciprocating

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: B. | EXTERNAL HYDRANT, SPRINKLER LINE & FDA
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing and commissioning of GI "C" Class(Heavy Class)  pipes conforming to IS 1239 with threaded or grooved fittings with  including cutting  pipes to correct lengths, providing fittings like elbow,tee,reducer and welding flanges to pipe, fixing with clamps to MS brackets / hangers, steel supports as per drawing.  Rate shall be inclusive of Zinc chromate primer over that 2 coats red enamel paint as per Fire authorities requirement over all above ground pies. Rates to be inclusive of  all complete as per specifications | 50 NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: class: C (Heavy Class), standard: indian standard 1239, fittings: threaded or grooved, fittings: elbow, tee, reducer, welding flanges, fixing: clamps to MS brackets / hangers, steel supports, coating: zinc chromate primer, coating: 2 coats red enamel paint, requirement: as per fire authorities, feature: above ground pipes

products_entries.full_product_description: Main IP based Networkable touch screen paging station  for selection of zones, supervision of system status, setting of scheduled broadcasts with the following functions: . Central exchage with Stand by CPU  . Built-in monitoring loudspeaker  . Goose-neck microphone  . LCD touchscreen display  . Audio input
